title.rendered: Smile Foundation organizes special health camp at Mayuranagar for expecting mothers

content.rendered: A special health camp was organised under Smile Foundation’s Swabhiman programme for expecting mothers at Mayuranagar, Bengaluru. The women received ante-natal check-ups and one-on-one counselling sessions, besides preventive, curative health services and free medicines. The health camp was led by Dr. Shanthi from KSM medical centre, and assisted by Swabhiman Health Volunteers (SHVs) and Community Health Educators (CHEs).
